Body: According to this Wikipedia article, new words come into the lexicon in a variety of ways, including borrowings, coinages, derivations from existing words, and extensions of meaning of existing words.

OwnerUser.AboutMe: I am a researcher at a company that specializes in speech synthesis research. I have a Ph.D. in linguistics from Cornell University, and my areas of specialty are phonology and phonetics. I also have a bachelor's degree in music.
